verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, to Jeduthun <WH3038>, A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. Truly my soul <WH5315> waiteth <WH1747> upon 'Elohim <WH430>: from him cometh my salvation <WH3444>.
He only is my rock <WH6697> and my salvation <WH3444>; he is my defence <WH4869>; I shall not be greatly <WH7227> moved <WH4131> <WH8735>.

How long will ye imagine mischief <WH2050> <WH8779> against a man <WH376>? ye shall be slain <WH7523> <WH8792> all of you: as a bowing <WH5186> <WH8803> wall <WH7023> shall ye be, and as a tottering <WH1760> <WH8803> fence <WH1447>.

They only consult <WH3289> <WH8804> to cast him down <WH5080> <WH8687> from his excellency <WH7613>: they delight <WH7521> <WH8799> in lies <WH3577>: they bless <WH1288> <WH8762> with their mouth <WH6310>, but they curse <WH7043> <WH8762> inwardly <WH7130>. Selah <WH5542>.
My soul <WH5315>, wait <WH1826> <WH8798> thou only upon 'Elohim <WH430>; for my expectation <WH8615> is from him.
He only is my rock <WH6697> and my salvation <WH3444>: he is my defence <WH4869>; I shall not be moved <WH4131> <WH8735>.
In 'Elohim <WH430> is my salvation <WH3468> and my glory <WH3519>: the rock <WH6697> of my strength <WH5797>, and my refuge <WH4268>, is in 'Elohim <WH430>.

Trust <WH982> <WH8798> in him at all times <WH6256>; ye people <WH5971>, pour out <WH8210> <WH8798> your heart <WH3824> before <WH6440> him: 'Elohim <WH430> is a refuge <WH4268> for us. Selah <WH5542>.

Surely men <WH120> <WH1121> of low degree are vanity <WH1892>, and men <WH376> of high degree are a lie <WH3577>: to be laid <WH5927> <WH8800> in the balance <WH3976>, they are altogether <WH3162> lighter than vanity <WH1892>.

Trust <WH982> <WH8799> not in oppression <WH6233>, and become not vain <WH1891> <WH8799> in robbery <WH1498>: if riches <WH2428> increase <WH5107> <WH8799>, set <WH7896> <WH8799> not your heart <WH3820> upon them.
'Elohim <WH430> hath spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> once <WH259>; twice <WH8147> have I heard <WH8085> <WH8804> this <WH2098>; that power <WH5797> belongeth unto 'Elohim <WH430>.
Also unto thee, O YY <WH136>, belongeth mercy <WH2617>: for thou renderest <WH7999> <WH8762> to every man <WH376> according to his work <WH4639>.
